## Workshop dinner

We are delighted to welcome all participants to the conference dinner to held at Dobson & Parnell on the evening of June 2, from 7pm onward. We look forward to bringing everyone together for an enjoyable evening of fine dining, connection, and celebration. Participants need to book their place in advance while registering for the event.

<br>

```{r echo=FALSE}
# https://stackoverflow.com/questions/61313078/create-a-carousel-in-rmarkdown

slickR::slickR(
    list.files(objpath,full.names = TRUE,pattern = 'jpg'),
    height = 250,
    width = '100%')
```
